articles.description: The castle in Aberdeenshire was temporarily closed for the return of the monarch to give his thanks to staff members who cared for his late mother
articles.content: King Charles III made a return to Balmoral on Sunday so that he could thank the soldiers who guarded the late Queen, and who helped give her a moving send off. He was driven to Balmoral in his electr… [+1404 chars]

articles.title: Woman 'spat at' for being ginger crowned Miss England - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Jessica Gagen said she was punched, spat at and even burned because of her red hair
articles.content:
A woman who was bullied at school for being ginger had the last laugh after being crowned the winner of Miss England.
